thread.title: STAG Industrial Appoints Michelle Dilley to Board of Directors

author: cnbc.com
title: STAG Industrial Appoints Michelle Dilley to Board of Directors
text:
BOSTON, March 13, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- STAG Industrial, Inc. (the "Company") (NYSE:STAG), a real estate investment trust (REIT) focused on the acquisition and operation of single-tenant, industrial properties throughout the United States, announced today the appointment of Michelle Dilley to its Board of Directors effective March 12, 2018.
Ms. Dilley has served as the chief supply chain transformation officer at DSC Logistics, Inc., a logistics and supply chain management organization, since 2017. In this role, she leads the implementation of strategic initiatives to deliver transformation and continuous improvement performance and has responsibility for engineering, safety and security, quality, and, in collaboration with human resources, training.
Previously, she served as senior vice president, operations at LaSalle Bristol, LP, a building products distributor, from 2014 to 2017, where she was accountable for supply chain operations throughout the United States and Canada. From 2009 to 2014, she served as vice president, supply chain at Ascension Health, a non-profit health system, where she led the supply chain business transformation and operational redesign. Ms. Dilley started her career at Whirlpool Corporation, where she served in a variety of roles, including general manager, global indirect goods & services sourcing from 2005 to 2009. Ms. Dilley holds a Bachelor of Arts degree from the University of Michigan.
"We are very pleased to welcome Michelle to our Board of Directors. With her supply chain management and logistics expertise, she brings a diverse perspective and additional insight into the evolving needs of distribution and warehouse tenants," said Benjamin S. Butcher, the Company's Chief Executive Officer, President and Chairman of the Board. "Michelle is a wonderful complement to our Board's extensive real estate, corporate finance and industrial operations experience."
Visit the Company's website to learn more about other members of its Board of Directors.
Ms. Dilley was identified through a national search conducted by Diversified Search.
About STAG Industrial, Inc.
STAG Industrial, Inc. is a real estate investment trust (REIT) focused on the acquisition and operation of single-tenant industrial properties throughout the United States. The Company's portfolio consists of 356 buildings in 37 states with approximately 70.2 million rentable square feet.
For additional information, please visit the Company's website at www.stagindustrial.com .
